block.p: American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Signed RHP Jason Davis. DETROIT TIGERS--Released LHP Jim Poole. Purchased the contract of LHP Allen McDill from Toledo of the International League. KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Optioned RHP Chad Durbin to Omaha of the Pacific Coast League. Purchased the contract of LHP Paul Spoljaric from Omaha. SEATTLE MARINERS--Agreed to terms with OF Rickey Henderson.

American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Signed RHP Jason Davis. DETROIT TIGERS--Released LHP Jim Poole. Purchased the contract of LHP Allen McDill from Toledo of the International League. KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Optioned RHP Chad Durbin to Omaha of the Pacific Coast League. Purchased the contract of LHP Paul Spoljaric from Omaha. SEATTLE MARINERS--Agreed to terms with OF Rickey Henderson.

National League MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Placed RHP Curtis Leskanic on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to May 12. Recalled LHP Ray King from Indianapolis of the International League. SAN FRANCISCO GIANTS--Placed RHP Joe Nathan on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to May 13. Recalled RHP Ben Weber from Fresno of the Pacific Coast League.

National Football League JETS--Signed DT Richard Seals. Waived FS Pedro Cirino. ATLANTA FALCONS--Agreed to terms with LB Mark Simoneau and CB Darrick Vaughn to three-year contracts. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Signed DE Rob Meier and RB Shyrone Stith.
National Hockey League ANAHEIM MIGHTY DUCKS--Agreed to terms with Craig Hartsburg, coach, on a two-year contract extension. MINNESOTA WILD--Signed F Kai Nurminen and F Brendan Walsh.

Major League Soccer MLS--Announced New England F Eduardo Hurtado has been transferred to an Ecuadorian first division club. COLUMBUS CREW--Signed F Jeff Cunningham. Named Marcello Carrera part-time assistant coach.

NCAA--Placed the men's cross country and track and field programs at Jackson State on five years probation for violations. BALL STATE--Named Tim Buckley men's basketball coach. DEPAUL--Announced junior basketball G Marlon London will transfer to the school from Kansas. MISSISSIPPI--Announced the resignation of Pat Harrison, baseball coach, and Keith Kessinger, assistant baseball coach. PACE--Named Henry Manning baseball coach. SIENA--Named William Garrett and John Dunne men's assistant basketball coaches.
